sentences.sContent: ...a prospectus for a new issue of stock.

synos.tran: 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书

remMethod.val: pro(在…前) + spect(看) + us(我们) → 在前面让我们看的 → 产品简介

trans.tranCn: 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书；学校的入学简介
trans.tranOther: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a company, college, or school, which gives details about it
